text: ==Teams== * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ===Preliminary Round=== In this round, the sixteen teams were allocated in four groups of four teams each. The top three will qualify for the Qualifying Round. The last team of each group will play for the 13th–16th place in the Classification Games. {| class="wikitable" |- | style="background: #ccffcc;" | |Team advances to Qualifying Round |- |
